articles.title: Kim Jong Il Gives Field Guidance to Mineral Water Processing Factory
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Gives Field Guidance to Mineral Water Processing Factory
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the National Defence Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, provided field guidance to the newly built hard glass shop at the Taean Friendship Glass Factory and the Kangso Mineral Water Processing Factory.
					 The first leg of his guidance was the newly built hard glass shop at the Taean Friendship Glass Factory.
					
					 After being briefed on the new shop in front of a huge map showing its panoramic view, he went round processes for producing heat ray reflection glass and hard glass to learn in detail about its construction, technical equipment and production there.
					
					 Watching all kinds of glass products coming out in an endless stream from the work places furnished with ultra-modern machines, he expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the factory successfully built by itself the modern shop producing second-stage processing products requiring high technology in a short span of time and is mass-producing special glass and varieties of quality glass products.
					
					 He noted that the above-said shop was successfully built to meet the requirements of the IT era ranging from its designing to its construction and technical equipment, praising the factory for building another shining structure helpful to ushering in a new period of prosperity in the era of Songun by displaying indomitable mental power.
					
					 Looking at various kinds of glass products including glass for doors, vehicles and trains and glass furniture made with silver grey, silver, light brown and blue color heat ray reflection glass and hard glass produced at the shop, he was satisfied with their high quality.  
					
					 He noted that this shop is a glass production centre with a very great prospect for production and profitability as it turns out special glass products for diverse uses with glass sheets mass-produced from quality sand found in abundance in the country.
					
					 He set forth important tasks which would serve as guidelines for managing and operating the shop.
					
					 Highly praising the workers of the factory for keeping the production going at a high rate, he stressed that to steadily boost the production by operating in full capacity the factory symbolic of the DPRK-China friendship is important for demonstrating the vitality of the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries.
					
					 The next leg of his guidance was the Kangso Mineral Water Processing Factory.
					
					 After being briefed on the medicinal efficacy of Kangso mineral water and the history of the factory by its leading official, he walked round the fountain from which the mineral water gushes out and the mineral water processing shops to learn in detail about their technical equipment and production.
					
					 Watching the mineral water endlessly gush out, he said that the factory tells about the love shown by President Kim Il Sung for the people as it is associated with the immortal leadership feats he performed by working heart and soul for the happiness of the people all his life, he said, adding that the great loving care shown by the President for the people would always be remembered by them.
					
					 Very pleased to see the worksites kept neat and tidy where hygienic safety is fully ensured and packed mineral water churning out from the streamlined production line put on a CNC basis, he expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the officials and workers of the factory successfully built the factory equipped with ultra-modern facilities and are operating it well.
					
					 Noting that the factory has a very important duty and role to play in protecting and promoting the health of the people, he advanced the tasks to be carried out by it.
					
					 An important task facing the factory is to boost the mineral water production and, at the same time, put its quality on a higher level, he said, underlining the need to continue dynamically pushing forward the work to put the factory on a modern and scientific basis and let the units related to the factory including the Ministry of Public Health positively assist it and help satisfactorily settle the issue of packing materials. 
					
					 He underlined the need to keep paying deep attention to creating hygienic and cultured environment as the factory handles drinking mineral water.
					
					 He expressed the expectation and conviction that the officials and workers of the factory would mass-produce famous mineral water good for the health of the people in the spirit of devoted service to them and supply greater quantities of mineral water to them.
					
					 He was accompanied by Kim Jong Un, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK, Kim Kuk Thae, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and chairman of the Control Commission of the WPK Central Committee, Choe Thae Bok and Hong Sok Hyong, members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the C.C., the WPK, Kim Kyong Hui, member of the Political Bureau and department director of the C.C., the WPK, Jang Song Thaek, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-chairman of the NDC, Pak To Chun, Choe Ryong Hae, Thae Jong Su and Kim Phyong Hae, alternate members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the C.C., the WPK, Mun Kyong Dok, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK and chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK, Ju Kyu Chang, alternate member of the Political Bureau and department director of the C.C., the WPK, and Pak Jong Sun, alternate member of the Political Bur
					
					 eau and first vice department director of the C.C., the WPK, and Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su, department directors of the NDC.

articles.title: Statement Released by Spokesman of DPRK Foreign Ministry
articles.content:
Statement Released by Spokesman of DPRK Foreign Ministry
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry Wednesday issued the following statement:
					 As already reported by the Supreme Command of the KPA, the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK on Nov. 23 took a decisive self-defensive measure to cope with the enemy's reckless military provocation of firing shells inside the territorial waters of the DPRK side around Yonphyong Islet in the West Sea of Korea.
					
					 The army of the DPRK warned several times that if even a single shell of the enemy is fired inside the territorial waters of the DPRK, it will take a prompt retaliatory strike in connection with the live shell firing drill they planned to stage from Yonphyong Islet while conducting the ill-famed war maneuvers for a war of aggression against the DPRK codenamed Hoguk.
					
					 At 8:00 a.m. on Nov. 23, the very day the incident occurred, the head of the delegation of the DPRK side to the inter-Korean military talks sent a telephone message to the head of the delegation of the enemy side once again strongly urging it to cancel the plan for staging the above-said firing drill in the waters around the islet, the sensitive waters.
					
					 This notwithstanding, the enemy committed such an extremely reckless military provocation as firing dozens of shells from the islet inside the territorial waters of the DPRK side from around 13:00.
					
					 The enemy fired shells from the islet which is so close to the territory of the DPRK that it is within each other's eyeshot despite the fact that there are so many mountains and rivers, sea waters and islets in south Korea. This powder-reeking saber-rattling cannot be construed otherwise than a politically motivated provocation.
					
					 The enemy is claiming that they fired shells southward from the islet in a bid not to get on the nerves of the DPRK but Yonphyong Islet is located deep inside the territorial waters of the DPRK away from the maritime military demarcation line. If live shells are fired from the islet, they are bound to drop inside the territorial waters of the DPRK side no matter in which direction they are fired because of such geographical features.
					
					 The ulterior aim sought by the enemy is to create the impression that the DPRK side recognized the waters off the islet as their "territorial waters", in case that there was no physical counter-action on the part of the former. 
					
					 Herein lies the crafty and vicious nature of the enemy's provocation.
					
					 The army of the DPRK took such a self-defensive measure as making a prompt powerful strike at the artillery positions from which the enemy fired the shells as it does not make an empty talk.
					
					 This incident is one more dangerous development which took place because of the illegal "northern limit line" unilaterally fixed by Clark, UN forces commander, as he pleased on Aug. 30, 1953 after the conclusion of the Korean Armistice Agreement.
					
					 The U.S., its followers and some bosses of international bodies should drop such bad habit as thoughtlessly accusing somebody before learning about the truth about the incident.
					
					 If they shield south Korea, the criminal, without principle, just for being their ally, this is little short of feeding oil to the fire. 
					
					 The DPRK that sets store by the peace and stability of the Korean Peninsula is now exercising superhuman self-control but the artillery pieces of the army of the DPRK, the defender of justice, remain ready to fire.

articles.title: S. Korean Group Accused of Scuttling Dialogue and Humanitarian Work
articles.content:
S. Korean Group Accused of Scuttling Dialogue and Humanitarian Work
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- After kicking off the war maneuvers for a war of aggression against the DPRK codenamed "Hoguk" the south Korean puppet group perpetrated on Nov. 23 such reckless military provocation as firing dozens of shells inside its territorial waters around Yonphyong Islet in the West Sea of Korea. The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK took such decisive military step as reacting to the reckless military provocation of the puppet group with a prompt and powerful physical strike.
					 Nevertheless, the puppet group dared make an uproar over "a provocation" from someone and cry out for "punishment" like a thief crying "Stop the thief!" To crown all, it announced that it would indefinitely put off the inter-Korean Red Cross talks slated to take place on Nov. 25.
					
					 The C.C., the Red Cross Society of the DPRK in a communique released in this connection on Nov. 24 vehemently denounces the Lee Myung Bak group for derailing the process for improving the inter-Korean relations, scuttling the inter-Korean Red Cross talks and driving the situation to the brink of war by pursuing its policy of confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 The grave military provocation perpetrated by the puppet group this time and its action to indefinitely delay the above-said talks glaringly show what it sought in remaining dead-set against the improvement of the inter-Korean relations and hamstringing any effort for it, the communique notes, and goes on: 
					
					 Given that the south Korean Red Cross declared the indefinite postponement of the talks after being reduced to a waiting maid of the puppet warmongers, we have no idea of remaining committed to settling humanitarian issues any longer. 
					
					 The Red Cross of south Korea should be held responsible for having scuttled such humanitarian undertakings as the normalization of the reunion of separated families and relatives before the whole nation.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group's treacherous and anti-reunification acts are intolerable as it vitiated the atmosphere for improving the inter-Korean relations overnight and drove the situation to the brink of war, challenging the desire of all the Koreans.
					
					 The Lee group of traitors will never be able to escape severer punishment by the nation as it derailed the noble humanitarian work and is bringing a horrible disaster to the fellow countrymen through its moves to escalate the confrontation with compatriots and war maneuvers.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Chinese Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Chinese Delegation
Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a friendly talk with the Chinese government public health delegation led by Minister of Public Health Chen Zhu at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Nov. 24.
					 Chen Zhu said that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two peoples provided by President Kim Il Sung together with Chairman Mao Zedong and Premier Zhou Enlai are growing stronger as the days go by.
					
					He recalled that General Secretary Kim Jong Il visited China twice this year, putting the bilateral ties of friendship and cooperation on a new high stage.
					
					 He noted that the Korean people are registering great successes in various fields in the spirit of self-reliance and fortitude.
					
					 He expressed the will to contribute to boosting the exchange between the two governments in the field of public health and medical science in the days ahead.

articles.title: DPRK-China Intergovernmental Agreement Inked
articles.content:
DPRK-China Intergovernmental Agreement Inked
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- A DPRK and China intergovernmental agreement on cooperation in the public health and medical science was inked at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Wednesday.
					 Present at the signing ceremony from the DPRK side were Minister of Public Health Choe Chang Sik and officials concerned and from the opposite side members of the Chinese government public health delegation led by Minister of Public Health Chen Zhu, Ambassador Liu Hongcai and staff members of the Chinese embassy here.
					
					 Choe Chang Sik and Chen Zhu signed the agreement.

articles.title: Kang Nung Su Meets Chinese Moviemaking Team
articles.content:
Kang Nung Su Meets Chinese Moviemaking Team
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- Vice-Premier Kang Nung Su met and had a talk with the moviemaking team of Chinese serial TV drama "Mao Anying" headed by Zou Xiaoti at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Wednesday.

articles.title: Friendly Meeting with  Chinese Graduates from Kim Il Sung University
articles.content:
Friendly Meeting with Chinese Graduates from Kim Il Sung University
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- A friendly meeting with the members of the alma mater-visiting group of Chinese graduates from Kim Il Sung University took place at the university on Wednesday.
					 They laid bouquets before the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Mt. Ryongnam and paid tribute to him.
					
					 Present there on invitation were members of the group headed by Xu Wenji, professor of Jilin University of China.
					
					 Vice-President Jo Chol, teachers and students of the university were on hand.
					
					 The participants enjoyed an art performance given by students and deepened the friendly feelings, singing and dancing together.

articles.title: Preview of Chinese Serial TV Drama Held
articles.content:
Preview of Chinese Serial TV Drama Held
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- A preview of the Chinese serial TV drama "Mao Anying," a gift presented to General Secretary Kim Jong Il by the team which produced Chinese serial TV drama "Mao Anying" took place at Taedongmun Cinema on Wednesday.
					 Present there were Pak Chun Nam, vice-chairman of the State Film Commission, Kim Chun Do, vice-chairman of the Central Broadcasting Committee of Korea, officials concerned and creators and artistes in the field of the movie industry.
					
					 Also present there were members of the above-said team headed by Zou Xiaoti, Minister Councilor Hao Xiaofei and embassy officials here and Chinese guests staying here.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Speakers said that it was of importance to hold a preview of the above-said film on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of death of Mao Anying who dedicated his precious youth after rushing to the Korean front under the banner of resisting America and aiding Korea, safeguarding the home and defending the motherland.
					
					 The participants watched the serial TV drama "Mao Anying" dealing with his life.

articles.title: Gift from Chinese Delegation
articles.content:
Gift from Chinese Delegation
Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- General Scretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by a Chinese government public health delegation on a visit to the DPRK.
					The gift was handed over to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday by Minister of Public Health Chen Zhu who is head of the delegation.

articles.title: Gift from Chinese Moviemaking Team
articles.content:
Gift from Chinese Moviemaking Team
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the moviemaking team of Chinese serial TV drama "Mao Anying" on a visit to the DPRK.
					 It was conveyed to Kang Nung Su, vice-premier of the Cabinet, Wednesday by Zou Xiaoti, head of the team.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Sends Message of Sympathy to Cambodian King
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Sends Message of Sympathy to Cambodian King
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a message of sympathy to Norodom Sihamoni, king of Cambodia, as regards an unexpected accident in Phnom Penh, claiming huge human casualties.
					 Kim in the message expressed deep sympathy and consolation to the king and, through him, to the victims and bereaved families and hoped that the king and government of Cambodia would eradicate the aftermath of the disaster as early as possible.

articles.title: New Books Published
articles.content:
New Books Published
Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- The Science and Encyclopedia Publishing House of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has brought out new books.
					 "U.S. Imperialists' Crime-woven History of Aggression on Korea", made up of four chapters, contains detailed data exposing their aggressive moves perpetrated against the Korean people through centuries. The book proves that they are a sworn enemy of the Korean people.
					
					 "History of Korean Land System" (Vol. 3) cites the landownership and land management in Korea under the Japanese imperialists' rule to prove that the feudal relations were intentionally maintained and strengthened in the countryside in that period due to their colonial policy.
					
					 "The Nation's Wisdom, and Weights and Measures" introduces measuring units used by the Korean people from the ancient times to modern times and explains their role in the economic, social and cultural development of the country.
					
					 It also shows that they had a great influence on Japan in the system of weights and measures and cultural development.
					
					 "History of Ancient Korea", "Kuryo History". "Silla History" (Vol. 1) and "History of Ri Dynasty" (Vol. 10), series of "Divisional History of Korea", have also been published.

articles.title: Japan's Wild Ambition for Territorial Expansion under Fire
articles.content:
Japan's Wild Ambition for Territorial Expansion under Fire
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- Japan is escalating the territorial disputes with China and Russia these days, claiming Diaoyu Islands in China and the Southern Kurils in Russia belong to it.
					 Minju Joson Wednesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 The ulterior aim sought by Japan in noisily peddling the non-existent issues of territories of its neighboring countries is to expand its territory by grabbing territories of other countries. 
					
					 The present Japanese authorities' hysteria over territorial disputes is obviously part of their campaign to revive the operations to usurp other countries' territories in the past era of the Japanese imperialists and moves to expand their territory.
					
					 Japan is becoming increasingly assertive for the claim to Tok Islets, part of the inviolable territory of Korea recognized by historical facts and international law. This is designed to grab this part of the territory of Korea at any cost.
					
					  The Japanese authorities are now distributing the maps on which Tok Islets are marked as part of Japan's territory in a bid to implant the distorted historical facts into the minds of the young Japanese. 
					
					 Moreover, the Japanese reactionaries again stipulated in the "2010 defense white paper" that Tok Islets are part of the territory of Japan.
					
					 Japan keeps so greedy eye on Tok Islets of Korea or the Southern Kurils of Russia and so on because they are located in the places of great military and geographical importance.
					
					 Japan is a war criminal state which launched a war to occupy large territories of Asian countries, advocating "the Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere" in the past and the only country in the world which has dodged settling its past crimes.
					
					 Japan would be well advised to realize that it is a wise option for it to awake from a pipe dream of territorial aggrandizement.

articles.title: Lecture on DPRK Given in Mexico
articles.content:
Lecture on DPRK Given in Mexico
Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- A lecture was given at National University of Economy of Mexico on November 18 to introduce the economic development in the DPRK.
					 Present at the lecture were political and public figures and teachers and students of the university.
					
					 Ramon Jimenez Lopez, president of the Mexican National Coordinating Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, gave a lecture titled "The Juche idea and economic development in the DPRK."
					
					 He explained the essence and great vitality of the Juche idea in the context of the reality of the DPRK.
					
					The key to all signal successes achieved in the economic development in the DPRK in recent years lies in the Juche idea which President Kim Il Sung founded and General Secretary Kim Jong Il has comprehensively developed in depth, he stressed.
					
					 He expressed belief that the Korean people would surely open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation under the uplifted banner of the Juche idea, the great guiding idea in the era of independence true to Kim Jong Il's plan for building an economic power.

articles.title: S. Korean Group's War Maneuvers under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Group's War Maneuvers under Fire
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on Nov. 18 accusing the U.S. and south Korean war maniacs of their anti-DPRK war maneuvers.
					 The statement denounced them for planning to stage the provocative Hoguk war exercises again.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 This saber-rattling poses a serious threat to the peace of the Korean Peninsula and the rest of the world.
					
					 The projected war exercises are part of the ceaseless war maneuvers targeted against the DPRK and run counter to the spirit of the June 15 Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 They are also part of the moves of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean authorities to stifle socialist Korea of Juche centered on the popular masses.
					
					 We demand the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean authorities halt at once their war maneuvers for aggression on the DPRK.
					
					 The statement called on the world progressive figures and adherents to the Juche idea, the Songun idea, to take positive actions against the above-said war racket of the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers.

articles.title: Story of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Story of Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- One April day in Juche 87 (1998) General Secretary Kim Jong Il watched an apparatus for carving picture on stone developed in the country.
					After watching it, he said it would be good to carve pictures on gravestones of fallen heroes and other martyrs.
					
					After stone pictures were attached to the gravestones in the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery, he visited it on September 19 that year and told officials that the lifelike stone pictures changed the appearance of the cemetery.
					
					He then said the stone pictures were another expression of the Workers' Party of Korea's trust in and love for the martyrs and their families.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno la Fabrica de Alimentos de Ryongsong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno la Fabrica de Alimentos de Ryongsong
Pyongyang, 24 de noviembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno el taller de salsa de soya recien construido en la Fabrica de Alimentos de Ryongsong.
					　Tras escuchar explicaciones sobre las especificaciones tecnologicas del nuevo taller, recorrio los procesos productivos de salsa de soya, sal refinada, carne molida, jamon y otros lugares haciendo conocimiento detallado del estado de construccion y produccion.
					
					　Es un gran exito que los obreros de la fabrica y los constructores militares hayan edificado magnificamente en un corto plazo este taller moderno equivalente a una fabrica alimentaria entera, dijo y se mostro muy satisfecho por la construccion de ese taller ejemplar que puede representar la epoca del Songun.
					
					　Este taller esta al nivel sofisticado tanto en la calidad de construccion como en la dotacion tecnica, senalo y apunto la necesidad de construir cada fabrica de modo impecable hasta en el remoto futuro. 
					
					　El nuevo y original sistema de produccion de salsa de soya, establecido en el taller, posibilita preparar este alimento basico indispensable en la vida alimentaria del pueblo coreano usando la enzima, una de las proteinas macromoleculares, sin valerse de metodos tradicionales o quimicos, dijo y agrego que este exito da lo mismo que alcanzar el nivel sofisticado en la produccion de alimentos basicos. 
					
					　Al instaurar el nuevo proceso productivo de sal refinada mediante la aplicacion de la tecnologia sofisticada, este taller ha sentado la solida base para suministrar a nuestro pueblo la sal de diferentes usos y las otras condimentadas, asevero y evaluo de altos los meritos de los funcionarios, obreros y tecnicos de la fabrica. 
					
					　La fabrica pudo registrar nuevo viraje en la produccion de alimentos basicos gracias a que los funcionarios, obreros y tecnicos vinieron desplegando dinamicamente el movimiento masivo de innovacion tecnica, en pleno acato a la idea de nuestro partido de conquistar la tecnologia de punta ateniendose a las condiciones reales del pais y desafiando al nivel mundial, apunto.
					
					　Anadio que este cambio orgulloso manifiesta claramente la justeza y la vitalidad de la politica de nuestro partido de tomar la ciencia y tecnica como cuestion vital para la construccion de la potencia economica. 
					
					　Esta fabrica es la paradigmatica de todo el pais no solo en la modernizacion y la cientifizacion de los procesos de produccion sino tambien en el establecimiento de la cultura de trabajo y vida, dijo y continuo que todas las unidades deben seguir el ejemplo de ella.
					
					　El Dirigente indico las tareas programaticas que se presentan en la operacion del taller. 
					
					　Expreso su gran esperanza y conviccion de que los funcionarios, obreros y tecnicos de la fabrica crearan nuevos milagros y meritos en la produccion de alimentos para cumplir plenamente con su papel de precursores y vanguardias en la sagrada lucha por mejorar la vida del pueblo. 
					
					　Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Kim Jong Un, vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Kuk Thae, miembro del Buro Politico (BP) y presidente de la Comision de Control del CC del PTC, Choe Thae Bok y Hong Sok Hyong, miembros del BP y secretarios del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui, miembro del BP y jefa de departamento del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del CDN, Pak To Chun, Choe Ryong Hae y Thae Jong Su, miembros suplentes del BP y secretarios del CC del PTC, Mun Kyong Dok, miembro suplente del BP, secretario del CC del PTC y secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Ciudad de Pyongyang, Ju Kyu Chang, miembro suplente del BP y jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Pak Jong Sun, miembro suplente del BP y primer subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su, jefes de departamento del CDN.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige la Escuela de Medicina de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige la Escuela de Medicina de Pyongyang
						
Pyongyang, 24 de noviembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la Escuela de Medicina de Pyongyang de la Universidad Kim Il Sung.
					  El Dirigente estuvo primero en la sala de presentacion del historial.
					
					  Esta escuela, visitada varias veces por el Presidente Kim Il Sung y la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk, es el centro docente benemerito con larga historia.
					
					  Al recordar con gran emocion las imborrables hazanas de guia del Presidente registradas en cada pagina de la orgullosa trayectoria del plantel docente, senalo que este ha sido fundado y desarrollado por la iniciativa personal y bajo la direccion minuciosa del Presidente y se ha convertido hoy en una base confiable para la formacion del personal tecnico de salud publica del pais.
					
					  Ratifico que seran grabados para siempre en el corazon del pueblo coreano los esfuerzos benevolos del Presidente realizados por fomentar la salud del pueblo.
					
					  Pasando revista a los exitos docentes y cientificos exhibidos en la escuela, se entero en detalles de los logros para el desarrollo de pedagogia y la investigacion medica.
					
					　Se mostro muy satisfecho de que los profesores, empleados y estudiantes hayan realizado muchos trabajos en los tiempos pasados.
					
					  Acto seguido, estuvo en varios laboratorios averiguando el estado de educacion y elogio el excelente acondicionamiento de ellos donde los estudiantes pueden asimilar los conocimientos utiles combinando estrechamente la leccion con la practica.
					
					  Al termino de su recorrido, el Dirigente presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia en la ensenanza y la investigacion cientifica.
					
					  Dijo que el PTC esta muy complacido de que la Escuela de Medicina de Pyongyang haya contribuido mucho, durante mas de 60 anos desde su fundacion, al desarrollo de salud publica del pais cumpliendo magnificamente su mision y deber.
					
					  Recalco que todos los graduados, incluyendo decenas de Heroes del Trabajo, son verdaderos ingenieros de la vida humana que trabajaron con abnegacion para salvar la vida del pueblo y fomentar su salud con el calido amor por este y anadio que el noble espiritu de sacrificio de ellos deviene la orgullosa tradicion de virtudes humanitarias de la epoca del Partido del Trabajo.
					
					  Apunto que la escuela debe formar a muchos galenos talentosos al mejorar y fortalecer incesantemente la educacion conforme a la demanda de la realidad en desarrollo teniendo presente siempre el proposito del PTC de llevar en un corto plazo al nivel mundial las ciencias y tecnicas medicas generales del pais.
					
					  Prosiguio que para ese fin, hay que ensenar sistematica y profundamente las teorias medicas y, a la vez, desarrollar con dinamismo la labor para investigar e introducir las ciencias y tecnicas avanzadas de medicina.
					
					  Dispenso gran amor y benevolencias subrayando que para producir un nuevo cambio en la formacion del personal tecnico, se debe garantizar suficientemente las condiciones necesarias a la educacion e investigacion cientifica y prestar profunda atencion a la vida de profesores, empleados y estudiantes.
					
					  Estimulo cordialmente a los educadores benemeritos que contribuyeron al desarrollo sanitario del pais dedicandose largo tiempo a la investigacion cientifica y educacion en esta escuela, y se retrato con ellos.
					
					  Acompanaron al Dirigente en esta ocasion         Kim Jong Un, vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central del PTC, Kim Kuk Thae, miembro del Buro Politico (BP) y presidente de la Comision de Control del CC del PTC, Choe Thae Bok y Hong Sok Hyong, miembros del Buro Politico (BP) y secretarios del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui, miembro del BP y jefa de departamento del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del CDN de la RPDC, Kim Yang Gon, Pak To Chun, Choe Ryong Hae y Thae Jong Su, miembros suplentes del BP y secretarios del CC del PTC, Mun Kyong Dok, miembro suplente del BP, secretario del CC del PTC y secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Ciudad de Pyongyang, Ju Kyu Chang, miembro suplente del BP y jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, y Pak Jong Sun, miembro suplente del BP y primer subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC.

articles.title: ACR de la RPDC condena a la banda de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
ACR de la RPDC condena a la banda de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 24 de noviembre (ATCC) -- El dia 23, las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea tomaron la resuelta medida militar de responder con un fuerte e inmediato golpe fisico a la aventurera provocacion militar de los titeres surcoreanos que dispararon decenas de obuses hacia las aguas jurisdiccionales de la RPDC en los alrededores de la isla Yonphyong en el Mar Oeste de Corea librando el ejercicio de guerra llamado "Hoguk" contra ella.
					　La camarilla de titeres surcoreanos, que habla ahora de la "provocacion" y "castigo correspondiente" a alguien partiendo de su logica de bandido, anuncio la posposicion por tiempo indefinido de las conversaciones de la cruz roja N-S previstas para el dia 25.
					
					　Al respecto, el Comite Central de la Asociacion de la Cruz Roja de la RPDC publico este miercoles una informacion condenando a la banda de Lee Myung Bak que en virtud de su politica conflictiva con la RPDC, impidio el mejoramiento de las relaciones intercoreanas, frustro totalmente las conversaciones de cruz roja N-S y llevo la situacion al borde de guerra.
					
					  Tal provocacion militar grave contra la RPDC y el anuncio de la dilacion indefinida de las conversaciones de cruz roja por parte de los titeres surcoreanos demuestran claramente cual es la verdadera intencion de ellos que rehusaron obstinada y totalmente el dialogo y el mejoramiento de relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas, senala la nota y prosigue:
					
					  Ya que la Sociedad de la Cruz Roja del Sur de Corea declaro tal medida actuando como aparato fiel a los belicistas surcoreanos, no tenemos la intencion de seguir esforzandonos mas por resolver los problemas humanitarios.
					
					  La Sociedad de la Cruz Roja del Sur de Corea debe asumir ante toda la nacion coreana la entera responsabilidad del fracaso de las labores humanitarias, incluyendo la normalizacion del encuentro de familiares y parientes separados.
					
					  No seran perdonados jamas los crimenes antinacionales y anti-reunificacion de la banda de Lee Myung Bak que llevo la situacion al estado de guerra rompiendo en un instante el clima de mejoramiento de las relaciones Norte-Sur en desafio frontal a la aspiracion de todos los coreanos.
					
					  La banda traidora surcoreana, que con sus maniobras orientadas al enfrentamiento fratricida y a la guerra, quebro hasta las sublimes labores humanitarias e impone tremendos desastres a la nacion, sera castigada mas duro por todos los compatriotas.

articles.title: Rubricado convenio entre los gobiernos de Corea y China
articles.content:
Rubricado convenio entre los gobiernos de Corea y China 
　Pyongyang, 24 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Quedo firmado este miercoles en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae el convenio de cooperacion en los sectores de salud publica y ciencias medicas entre los gobiernos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y de la Republica Popular China.
					　En la ceremonia de firmas estuvieron presentes el ministro de Salud Publica Choe Chang Sik  y otros funcionarios por la parte coreana y por la china, los miembros de la delegacion gubernamental de salud publica de China encabezada por el ministro de Salud Publica Chen Zhu, el embajador Liu Hongcai y otros miembros de la embajada china en Corea.
					
					　El documento fue suscrito por los titulares de salud publica de ambos paises.
